title: The End of Summer: Part One
description: The End of Summer Part One is a forbidden love affair between Richard and Rebecca. It's a delicious encounter filled with joy, lust, heartbreaks and new beginnings. During a summer visit to New York City to spend a few days with her daughter, Rebecca met Richard, a handsome college student and a friend of her daughter. Immediately, Richard and Rebecca fell in love and began a lustful secret affair. A strike of fate asserted their forbidden relationship. As their love grew so did a late summer storm and it threatened to snuff out the flame of their love.
author: Alex M. Smith
